column4: hello, sometimes (specially when using totem or something graphics-related) my computer starts running very slow.
The system monitor shows 1 cpu goiong 100%
even if i close all programs
and if i look at the processes tab, no app is using the cpu
any help?
any idea of where i can ask help for this?
What other apps or sustems are running?
nothing, even if I close everything the problem persists and i have to log out
How many OSs are on that box?
just ubunto 9.04
new computer
i suspect it is some problem with the graphic card
but i don't know what to do
I am unsure but something sounds really wrong there, is it a laptop?
desktop
you know where i could look for help?
Are all the fans and Heatsinks clean or air out?
yes + i can see the temperature of the card and it's ok

You can always look at Launchpad, to see if any others have reported this, that would be the first thing I would check, heatsinks and stuff, maybe is a loose cord /IIDE , or something, but that is just odd for CPU at 100% on a fresh and clean machine.
ok, thx
the thing is that i can't reproduce it at will, but it has happened several times
Please remember that 9,04 is still beta, so Launchpad is the place to report such activity and also to find solutions.
